data.expected_result: The volume should be adjusted according to the value/position of the slidebar
data.short_description: The output volume slidebar in general voice settings doesn't work
data.steps_to_repro: - Join any voice channel with a friend. If you're alone and have no friends, you can use a music bot instead - Have your friend speak in the vc, or play a song using the bot - While you're listening to your friend/the song, go to the **general** voice settings (not channel settings or user profile) - Try to move the output volume slidebar
